creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
A header set with "Header always set foo bar" doesn't show up in the response when that response is streamed into the cache, but it does show up when it is served from the cache.

In 2.2, the header showed up in both cases.

Tested with 2.2.x and 2.4.x r1496438 and they differ.

creator: Chaosed0@gmail.com
text:
Fixed in another bug report.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 56898 ***
